last_replies.name: Anonymous
last_replies.com:
>>6998839
Try clearing your cache, RPGXs is stored under dmm.co.jp for whatever reason on FF, probably the same on chrome. Then Ctrl+F5 on the RPGX page.
If that fails press F12 and go to the network tab there should be a Disable Cache checkbox in the top right, enable it. Refresh the page again with Ctrl+F5. If it's still failing after that you can check the Console tab for any errors or go through the Network tab and look for things that haven't got Status 200 and that's probably what's blocking the load from finishing.

>I only like momcest if the mom is somewhat reluctant throughout the whole time
I agree, but I think there are multiple ways to do this. Take "My mom, my love" as an example. The mom agrees to have sex pretty early due to her son's sincerity and at first it feels more like a teaching experience and she's clearly trying to uphold her role as his mother and still wants him to eventually move on and get a girlfriend. Later she openly enjoys their sex, but she's still reluctant when it comes to her son's feelings. It's not so much that she's reluctant sexually, but more emotionally, and she's slowly losing herself in the passion and realizing that it's more than just sex for her. I'm a big fan of this type of development because you get good sex scenes, but also a nice contrast and conflict of her feelings as mother vs lover. Seeing a mom slowly realizing that she loves her son as a man is always great.

"Mother and no other" by horsetail is one of my favorites, but you can tell it's his first real work because it lacks some polish. Sometimes the mom's character feels a bit inconsistent when she suddenly does a cheeky smile and is openly into it. It feels like horsetail just started gung-ho drawing some stuff he liked and only realized along the road where he really wanted to go with the story. And personally I think he hasn't mastered the "giving in" part yet. His endings are a little bit too wishy-washy because it feels like the women still just tolerate the guy's advances, instead of really wanting it themselves as well. He's still one of the greats though.

Upsaler I have a question about gifski: How do I make it so my gifs aren't gigantically filesized?

It turns a 700kb clip into a 6mb gif despite it being 1:1 without any upscale or quality setting increase

last_replies.name: Anonymous
last_replies.com:
>>6998009
Gifs are a dogshit format and will be gigantic compared to video (In almost every case). If you want lower filesize, either set the size with something like -W to specify width (It'll keep aspect ratio) or -Q to set the quality. 0 being lowest, 100 being highest. Mess around with it until you find what is an acceptable quality loss to you. Default quality is 75 I believe.
You can also use -compression_level if I'm not mistaken, which is default to 4. It goes from 1 to 6.

last_replies.name: Anonymous
last_replies.com:
>>6998134
NMKoder
https://github.com/n00mkrad/nmkoder
Use that for pretty much anything. Go to Quick Convert and just set the encoder to VP9 and change the color format to YUV 4:2:0 10 bit and speed preset to 0 if you want the best quality. Though keep in mind it will take some time depending on your system and the length, resolution and framerate of your clip.
Make sure audio is set to Opus, if you have any audio.
Either adjust CRF or set a target filesize.

One last thing that really stuck out is that he puts some kind of gem system in all these simulators. This one is hard. Things go from bad to worse before anything gets better. I'm not even going to spoil for you who his sister is. You can look that up yourself. Here's the cover for the game instead.

One of the girls in this game is the MC's little sister. MC doesn't even know. The imouto knows. She's not going to tell. She is TERRIFIED, that if she tells her brother who she is that he will reject her and she is already deeply, hopelessly in love with him. You see, her mother had her after their parents divorced. She didn't want to admit to her ex husband she was pregnant. His sister was born in secret to avoid a custody dispute. One of the girls in this game is his full, 100% little sister.

This actually happened in Japan. A boy tried to marry his little sister around 2005. They grew up in different families and met in high school. They fell in love before they discovered they were related. When they found out the boy tried to marry his sister anyway. It went to court. The judge ruled in the couple's favor stating that unfortunately the law did not allow him to prevent their marriage. The law is only interested in 'legal relations' and not 'blood relations'. He warned that if the people of Japan wanted to prevent blood relations from marrying they needed to update the law. He further warned that if siblings in Japan want to marry all they would need to do is become adopted by separate families. I am not making this up.

This is VN about exactly that happening but in this, the brother rejects the relationship. Things go bad, very bad, before it gets any better. I promise though, there is a happy ending in the end.
